title: Amulet of Selûne's Chosen
content:
hattered Sanctum, walk up the stairs behind the throne of the leader, unlock the gate and its in one of the chests.

Amulet of Selûne's Chosen Notes & Tips

Gale will request to absorb this item and essentially disenchanting it of its special ability.
